instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data:
Remove all paint by manual, chemical or mechanical methods.
Sand surface until wood is smooth to the touch.
Hammer all nails deep enough to apply wood filler.
Dust off surfaces completely then wipe with a clean rag.

instructions.title: MATERIAL PREPARATION
instructions.data: Sealer: 3.5-Liters of Hudson®® Polyurethane Floor Varnish Sealer should be thoroughly mixed with ½ Liter of its catalyst. The product workability is only for 4 hours, maximum. Any unused material will gel. Topcoat: Hudson®® Polyurethane Floor Varnish Topcoat is mixed with its catalyst on a 3:1 ratio by volume, respectively. Maximum workability of mixture is 4 hours. Any unused material will gel.

instructions.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Sealer (1st and 2nd coats): Hudson®® Polyurethane Floor Varnish Sealer Topcoat (3rd to 5th coats): Hudson®® Polyurethane Floor Varnish Topcoat

instructions.title: NOTES
instructions.data: Allow the product to cure for 3 days for foot traffic abrasion and 7 days for heavy-duty use.

calculator.title: Sealer
calculator.item: Hudson®® Polyurethane Floor Varnish Sealer

calculator.title: Topcoat
calculator.item: Hudson®® Polyurethane Floor Varnish Topcoat

calculator.title: Thinning Solvent for Sealer and Topcoat
calculator.item: Hudson®® Polyurethane Floor Varnish Reducer
calculator.note: Application using brush. For spray-applied, thin not more than 1:1 mixing ratio of Hudson®® Polyurethane Reducer.

calculator.title: Complete removal to bare substrate is recommended prior to repainting.
